servinfo.title: Speedometer shows no operation or incorrect operation

condition.ptxt: Speedometer shows no operation or incorrect operation

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Data (information) can not be received by CAN communication

action.ptxt: Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:For Petrol Engine Model or DTC Check:For Diesel Engine Model .

ps.ptxt: Rear wheel speed sensor or sensor ring faulty

action.ptxt: Check rear wheel speed sensor or sensor ring referring to Front and Rear Wheel Speed Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection or Rear Wheel Encoder On-Vehicle Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
